name: ludlow basket bag
notes:
a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog [here][1].

get that downtown it-girl look with this high-end faux leather tote ready for the city streets. tightly crocheted for extra structure and functionality, this is an everyday bag built to be used.

shop the kit [here][2].

**finished dimensions**
length: 12.25”/31cm
depth: 5”/13cm
height: 11”/28cm
strap length: 16”/40.5cm

**difficulty level**
easy

**skills**
single crochet
half double crochet
slip stitch
working in turned rows and joined rounds
crocheting along a side edge

all patterns are written in standard us terms.

sign up for info on special offers, sales, and new pattern releases: bit.ly/townewsletter
